website_summaries.verdict: The SleepMaster bed looks like a "real" bed because of the bedskirt, and is very durable, but may be too firm for some buyers.
pros: The SleepMaster has a 5-inch mattress, with 1 inch of memory foam, and 4 inches of high-density foam, and the bedskirt gives the bed a finished look
The steel frame is durable and the bed assembles easily
cons: Users report the bed may be problematic to fold up
The mattress is very firm, which may not be comfortable, or meet every sleeper's preference

customer_reviews.title: Just get it!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Only4 stars because it moves! What a shame they didn't put locking wheels on it. The only problem is.... it moves when you get in, or turn over or get out (locking wheels would have definitely given it a 5th star) ....but it is absolutely one of the most comfortable beds I've slept on - including my own regular, expensive bed. Don't know why some say it's hard as a rock because it isn't. It's just firm and really, really comfortable.Definitely love the extra width and length as opposed to most folding beds. You could absolutely use this every night.
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: A real stinker!
customer_reviews.text: This guest bed is very comfortable and nicely constructed. I'm disappointed it didn't work out. The foam has a VERY strong chemical smell that has dissipated some over four days, but is still so strong it makes me ill to be near it. I cannot let a guest use this bed and expose them to the fumes and off gassing.
customer_reviews.author: Mare

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and comfortable adult bed
customer_reviews.text: All my guests who slept on this bed, all adult males, reported it to be a very comfortable bed and that they slept soundly. The bed matched my requirements of having sturdy construction, comfortable mattress, twin size, and easy to manage. I definitely feel that I got my moneys worth and would recommend this to others who are looking for a quality rollaway guest bed. Yes there are cheaper ones out there and there is a reason for that. Avoid them unless you are accommodating small children.
customer_reviews.author: G Cee

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and sturdy but narrow.
customer_reviews.text: This fold-out is unexpectedly sturdy. It can support a large man. The foam mattress is also very comfortable. This is nothing like the cots I remember when I was young. It folds up easily. It’s not wide someone large who likes to roll in their sleep may not feel they have enough room. My little mom said it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Priscilla

customer_reviews.title: Nauseating smell
customer_reviews.text: Very strong nauseating smell, gives me headache within minutes of being in the same room. How are you supposed to sleep on this for hours. Had it out on the porch for two days it still smells. --------- UPDATE ---------- After a week of having this under a covered porch outside with the fan blowing on it, it still smelled but it was bearable enough to bring it into the house.
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Glad I bought this extra bed!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bed for the price! Folds up compact and rolls away easily to store. Very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Babs

customer_reviews.title: It is Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Due to a shortage of room space, I use this for a bed and a couch. I decided it was a bit low to the ground (but very comfortable) and needed some height. So I bought a 6-inch memory foam mattress from the same company to put on top of it. Talk about comfort. WOW. The bed/couch is higher and easier to get in and out of. If I need to move it for space it's easy-- for the extra mattress is light and the cot folds up beautifully. I can't say enough about this wonderful bed. No, I'm not saying cot because unless someone told you it was one they would never know the difference. It's perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: fairgirl

customer_reviews.title: Answer to a prayer...
customer_reviews.text: This resort bed was perfect. So much more than a rollaway bed. My mother, age 85, during her visit from Texas used, set up on main floor living room, can't do stairs anymore. She was very happy to report very comfortable. The ease of set up and take down was a breeze. The additional purchase of cover very helpful in keeping clean. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Happy girl

customer_reviews.title: The cover has a horrible odor but I washed it at a commercial laundry ...
customer_reviews.text: The cover has a horrible odor but I washed it at a commercial laundry and it's fine. The bed works well and for an adult, I use risers to make it a little taller so that they don't feel they are sleeping on the floor. When opened the bed is about a foot above the floor and the risers make it about two feet.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great Guest Bed
customer_reviews.text: Very nice twin size bed easy to set-up and store. I purchased to set a bedroom for my mom in the lower level of my house as she cannot climb stairs. We moved the coffee table and it fit right in front of the couch. The foam mattress is not thick but comfortable when I laid on it. Just for safe measure we added a foam topper and my mom sleep like a log. After the visit it folded up nicely and stored away.
customer_reviews.author: Tea Bee

customer_reviews.title: This bed is great for guests
customer_reviews.text: This bed is great for guests, espelly for a few days. Very easy to fold up and store. Takes standard sheets. The plastic bag that the mattress comes in is big and tough enough to be used for a stroage cover over the whole folded unit by just cutting off the excess length. Well made - excellent casters. Replaced the pricey blow-up beds that don't stay inflated even overnight. I'm going to buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: good or not

customer_reviews.title: Smells!
customer_reviews.text: So I’ve had this bed unwrapped and open with fan running and even opened the windows for 2 days and it’s making the whole room stink like chemicals!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Love these beds!
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these for when my aging in laws visit - they have both raved about these beds. At first I was a bit hesitant due to the cost but went ahead anyway based upon other reviews and so glad that I did. They fold up really nicely out of the way and fit a regular size twin sheet. BTW, NOT a paid reviewer!
customer_reviews.author: C. Knipe

customer_reviews.title: COMFY!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really comfy! I bought this for my son to use when he comes to visit and I swear I now keep it in my laundry room to nap, read or just chill out on. My back loves it! I honestly am surprised that it didn’t cost more!! Ive read smell complaints but I found no issue with the SLIGHT odor out of plastic wrap. It dissipated guickly. I don’t have time to rate things usually but I’ve had this now a month or so and love it so much I needed to let people know that it’s WELL WORTH it! You won’t be disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Great bed for overnight guests.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two beds. They were delivered very fast. Extremely pleased . They are very easy to use. I don't think any guest would be unhappy to sleep on this bed. I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Linda S.

customer_reviews.title: Bingo: Good Bed -- Good Mattress -- Good Value
customer_reviews.text: Our Grand Daughter loves this bed: she was 2 1/2 when we bought it and a year later it is her perfect sleep over platform. Our adult guests have enjoyed it too -- it's a real Twin size. Easy-to-set up and easy-to- fold-up and roll away into a closet space for storage. My wife can operate it without any problem. Only problem: remind people to unfold the 4 legs each time they open it up to use it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: The smell is real!
customer_reviews.text: This bed is super cute, and very comfortable, perfect for a few overnights, and definitely better than an air mattress. BUT, the smell... I received this eight days ago and have had it sitting open for the last seven days to deal with the smell. It spent a full day out in the sun and fresh air, and has been sitting open inside when not outside, but the smell remains. The cover is removable, so I have washed that, and DRENCHED the mattress in fabreeze, hoping that a few more days open and in the sun will get it eliminated, but definitely buy this well in advance of having someone sleep on it!
customer_reviews.author: Froggie0115

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for a spare bed. It's the size of a twin mattress. Plenty of room for one adult to sleep on. The mattress is firm but in no way is it rock hard like some of the negative reviewers said. I'm going to get a foam topper for it and it will be even a lot better. The frame is well made. All steel construction and should hold up for many, many years. It folds up easily with no difficulty and the nice sized wheels make it easy to push, even on carpet. I made a very good decision in buying this.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: It was so so easy to assemble so easy for her to fold and ...
customer_reviews.text: My mom asked for a roll away bed and this is what i got, she loves it. It was so so easy to assemble so easy for her to fold and put away (she's older) she says it's very comfortable and wants another one. I laid on it to test it out, it's a little too firm for my taste but not uncomfortable. If I had to sleep on it I'd put extra blankets beneath me. Worth the price and worth my mom being so impressed lol. Overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Sasha nachu

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable compact folding bed!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS!!! I actually bought a second one. Comfortable, easy to roll & very compact. I just roll it into my closet after guests leave. Looks way more expensive than it is. The first bed I received was missing one of the folding support legs. I called Amazons awesome customer service, they told me to tape the box up, put it back on the front porch, and they would pick it up the next day. A replacement bad in perfect condition was delivered three days later.Highly recommend this purchase! My husband was initially skeptical about buying a folding bed. He’s completely come around though, and thinks this was an excellent purchase as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Bohemian

customer_reviews.title: The chemical smell never goes away.
customer_reviews.text: I have aired this in the garage for 3 weeks, pressed on the mattress several minutes, with a big box fan blew air for hours, slept on it for 10 days and it still has the chemical foam mattress smell so strong that it fills the bedroom overnight and all of your clothes stink.
customer_reviews.author: Sinan Ussakli

customer_reviews.title: Foam mattress really stinks and doesn't lose its odor!
customer_reviews.text: While the overall "package" was decent for the price, the mattress is a bummer. The packing material said: "Your product may initially have a slight odor which is normal with newly manufactured foam. We recommend that you place your product in a well-ventilated area, and please allow up to 72 hours [3 days] for the odor to completely dissipate". After 216 hours [9 days] in a well-ventilated area (including 4 days in outdoor fresh air), the mattress still has a very distinct and discernable odor.
customer_reviews.author: Phil in Kennesaw

customer_reviews.title: Get a thicker mattress
customer_reviews.text: Got this because I have a tiny house and needed something versitle, this is it! The mattress that comes with it is kinda thin so I bought a thicker one for it and used the one that came with it as a backrest like a couch, so comfy now I sleep on it every night even though I have a full size bed lol
customer_reviews.author: matt b.

customer_reviews.title: Don't hesitate this bed is great. I know this one is a lil bit ...
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate this bed is great. I know this one is a lil bit more money but it's well worth it. Just used it for the first time over the past few days and the person using it loved it said it was very comfortable wider than any oft the other roll-away beds i have looked at.
customer_reviews.author: Srebrina

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the best purchases I've made on Amazon.... Hand down.. Almost a better bed than the one I have in my bedroom! Fast shipping too! Every friend of mine that comes over and see's this thing, are really amazed.. Great buy and highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Yoeliko

customer_reviews.title: Too firm for some ppl but...
customer_reviews.text: Very firm mattress, that could be a con for some buyers. At the same time a firmer mattress will last years. Lasting years is an overall plus for me. It is very well built and easy to assemble. Storing is a breeze, folds up nicely. The bed is light weight for me. My pregnant wife finds it easy to move and light weight. The overall look is exactly as the images that are shown. Long story short here I do not regret this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Public name (required)

customer_reviews.title: High quality, VERY firm mattress
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this folding bed for two years for guests. It is very well constructed, easy to put together and store. No sagging and the base/frame is excellent and sturdy. The mattress is VERY firm, to the point that it will be uncomfortable for some. A foam topper helps a lot, but the bed can't be folded and stored with a mattress topper- makes it too thick to fully fold together. I wish it came with a cover to put over the whole thing when folded. Otherwise, I'm glad I bought it, it has served us well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but stinky
customer_reviews.text: Very comfy for such a small bed. Only problem is the smell. It's been 3ish weeks and there is a lingering smell. I have washed the cover (which helped...it retained the smell quite badly), but there is still a bit of the memory foam smell. Hoping another month of open windows will help. If you need to get this before people stay over, get it as far ahead of time as you can, and wash the mattress cover.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The narrow size is just fine for average sized people
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to purchase the skinnier version, but figured for the extra $100 the little bit of width might not be worth it. If your guests are up to 200 lbs and under 6 feet, they will be fine for a night or a few. The bed is very sturdy and looks great- you could leave it out as a day bed and throw some cushions on it. Looks like a piece of furniture, rather than one of those cheap roll away beds. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Justanotherbuyer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this fir over 6 months..... main use for was our toddler bc its short to ground. My biggest issue is the heat. It retains or absorbs heat and so for me to sleep on causes alot of tossing and turning and when i wake up my whole back and butt is hot ( back sleeper) also i got extra long.... sheets not made for this. Then again i use this on a daily basis for my toddler its her bed.. i dont think this is meant to sleep on all the time.. only for guests and once in a while.
customer_reviews.author: Vane Celeste Molina

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: I'm really loving this bed. Was so easy to put the wheels on. So much better than an air mattress. Easy to move wherever it is needed. I am no spring chicken and I got it out of the box, put the wheels on, pulled out the legs, and unfolded it all by myself. I have another (a queen) Zinus mattress that I bought last year and in my estimation you can't go wrong with that brand. When a guest comes all I have to do is unlatch the latch, unfold the bed and put on the sheets. Wonderful. Ready in minutes. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Oakley

customer_reviews.title: Not very comfortable for more than one night
customer_reviews.text: Besides not receiving all the parts for one of the units ordered, the mattress is just a heavy piece of foam. It feels good for a bit, but not very comfortable for one or two nights.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: The best foldaway bed-  Insane value!
customer_reviews.text: The frame is very sturdy. It definately can last. And the 5" memory foam mattress is the best folding bed mattress I ever seen. It's firm but super super comfortable. the skirt that covers the base of the metal frame makes the bed look great and look like a true bed in guests eyes. Price is not cheap but fully justifiable. If you care to get the best quality-for-the-money foldaway bed for guests, you've got it here. Seriously, this is a foldway bed buyer must buy!
customer_reviews.author: mark

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be a really great guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be a really great guest bed. Received quickly. Easily pushed the box into my garage and my son assisted me yesterday in removing the box and putting the wheels on the bed - took maybe 10 minutes total - and seems to be very comfortable. I carefully opened the plastic it was packaged in and was able to re-use it to protect the bed as it is sitting in my garage awaiting an overnight guest. Very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: desertsand

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable sleeping in limited space
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for our very small ~8'X10' guest bedroom. It was easy to set up and move around as it is lightweight, but somehow still very sturdy. Kinda amazing. I slept in it last night to test it before my guest arrives. Very nice. I just ordered another one so that I can set them up together or separately depending on number of guests. I love how it has the bedskirt attached. Looks very clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks attractive; sets up easily in seconds!
customer_reviews.text: This is fabulous, looks attractive and sets up easily in seconds with no hardware (and I am lazy and weak!) Comfortable foam mattress. No wait time for mattress to decompress. Has sturdy legs that can be folded away at storage, and casters for when you fold it up and roll it to storage. It's look is such that it could be left out as a daybed with decorative pillows. Couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: No one believes it's a fold up bed!
customer_reviews.text: It fits a 5'11" male. It does not look like a roll-a-way bed. I asked my husband to fold it up and hook it at the top after our guest left and he came back and said, "It's not going to fold. I thought you got a bed that folds so we could store it?" He was a bit irate. I went into the guest room and folded one end up. He looked at me incredulously. When the bed is set-up you cannot see a crease. It looks like a piece of upholstered furniture. It was used for 3 months straight and still looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Raine

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to accommodate a guest when you live in a small place.
customer_reviews.text: I have a small place and needed a bed that I could fold up and put away. The need arose when I needed to accommodate my brother who is occasionally in town on business. It was perfect, in fact he liked it so well that he insisted on paying me for it. He leaves it here, but will be using it every time he is in town. He claims it was extremely comfortable and thinks it's a great bed. I should mention also, it is an incentive to see him for a nice visit every now and then.
customer_reviews.author: Rainlady

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable bed at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: A modern and comfy version of the old-style “rollaway bed” - really nice, firm (but not too hard) foam mattress, very lightweight to roll around yet very sturdy to sleep on, and it folds and unfolds very easily. Came fully assembled except for popping the casters on. My adult grandson got a really great night’s sleep! Very attractive as such things go, with a gray geometric print cover on mattress and bed - does not look too unsightly in the corner of the room. Highly recommend as a spare bed for guests.
customer_reviews.author: Ypsi Traveler

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with this bed
customer_reviews.text: Love pretty much everything about this folding bed except for just one thing. The hook or the strap or the latch or belt that holds the two folded sections of the bed is too short and too tricky while closing. If I have the mattress pad on it then it's impossible to close it. I wish they would solve this issue. But really very nice and comfortable bed . Would totally recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Anoop Rawat

customer_reviews.title: Great bed!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how sturdy this bed is made and it moves so easily! I purchased it for a permanent bed and had a spare 4 inch memory foam mattress topper. It is worth the price to me. I placed both mattresses in a hypoallergenic zippered bag that is cloth-like. Right now, my 7 year old grand child sleeps on it, and loves the feel of it. My grown daughter sneaks naps on it when she can. The bed looks like a regular twin.
customer_reviews.author: SueT.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!! Not regrets!
customer_reviews.text: the bed came much earlier than expected! And I’m so surprised about the quality, and how easy it works! The mattress cover case had a chemical smell but I washed before I used it and that’s it! So I don’t think this product deserves less that 5 stars just because of that! It is a great product and worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Geannie

customer_reviews.title: Not what was expected
customer_reviews.text: The smell is just so horrible not what I expected for paying 264$ for this. For someone with allergy and asthma don’t get this the odor is just strong I left it for few hours outside to for some air the smell still there. Plus the locks don’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Bija

customer_reviews.title: Comfy, sturdy, stylish...
customer_reviews.text: This bed is perfect. The foam mattress is nice and firm, and there was absolutely no offgas smell upon first opening, a common complaint with foam mattresses. The built-in bedskirt makes this look way fancier than your average folding cot. One might even mistake it for a conventional boxspring/mattress setup. It's light enough for two people to lift and maneuver in the box, and when put together with the wheels it's a breeze for one person to move around a room. The steel frame appears much sturdier than the more commonly seen spring suspension. This is a great alternative to an air mattress. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K. Allen

customer_reviews.title: ... got the narrow twin (30" wide) This is an awesome bed. The only assembly was removing from package ...
customer_reviews.text: I got the narrow twin (30" wide) This is an awesome bed. The only assembly was removing from package and screwing in the wheels. Great huh! I put it in my small sewing room for the infrequent guest. It did have a slight odor when first opened, but is dissipating quickly. I like the firmness and comfortability. The mattress has a removeable cover for the convenience of cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: B. Holloway

customer_reviews.title: very pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: received in two days. only assembly was to screw in wheels, no tools needed. four legs fold out and lock. four wheels make it easy to roll into closet for storage. the foam mattress is firm. easy to fold , took a little extra muscle from husband to hook strap to hold in folded position. ready for the holidays and extra guests. much more comfortable than couch or air bed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bed - Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: For a folding bed, the mattress is very comfortable. The wheels make it easy to move once it's folded up and can be locked when it's not. I fold it up every morning and up it in the corner to save space. One negative is the built-in strap holding it together was so tight I had to use pliers to get it undone, but after that, I just cut it off since it's really not needed. Well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Shoper1

customer_reviews.title: Missing leg - unusable frame
customer_reviews.text: I am extremely disappointed. Ordered this bed as a convenient way to have an extra guest bed and one of the legs on the frames was missing. Not sure how as the assembly of the leg has two screws holding it to the plate, but the leg, plate, and screws were all gone from the leg. Completely useless for our first guest and a total hassle to have to box it up and possibly send it back. Next time Zinus QA's, make sure all the legs and proper parts are included.
customer_reviews.author: C. Opalak

customer_reviews.title: Very nice guest bed - clean look
customer_reviews.text: Very nice guest bed - clean look, great wheels, glides across the floor when folded. A bit bulky that that goes with being a guest bet, and the good news was moving it from home to storage wasn't complicated even with stairs. The bed is firm, very firm and a fiberbed or thick mattress cover does make it more enjoyable for those used to a softer bed. Other than that, a great choice, my family slept well and long hours and said it was very comfy for a holiday visit.
customer_reviews.author: JDinSeattle

customer_reviews.title: Great bed/cot
customer_reviews.text: Really great bed. Have had it for a few months now and absolutely no complaints. Mattress is still very comfortable, even after a lot of use. Just a really nice extra bed/cot that is convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good bed but it does smell funny
customer_reviews.text: The bed is easy to assemble and is comfortable for my 9 year old son who is afraid to sleep in his own room. The bed is very narrow so it fits nicely in the corner of the room and folds up easily. The only issue I see is the smell. We have had it for awhile now and I still can smell this weird smell from it. Otherwise it’s a great bed for the price
customer_reviews.author: april tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: I was pleasantly surprised that my house guests like this one so much better than the real bed
customer_reviews.text: I replaced an old queen bed with this one in my guest room. I was pleasantly surprised that my house guests like this one so much better than the real bed! It's also easy to fold up and store. Very nice looking, too!
customer_reviews.author: calgal

customer_reviews.title: How long will they stay?
customer_reviews.text: This was for my use at a family members home. Unfortunately it was longer than intended of a visit and I found the mattress uncomfortable after 2 months and since my visit was still going to be a bit I just went and bought a twin mattress to put on it instead. But I love the fold and roll feature and for a week or two visit or children this is excellent; I would recommend it. It also is very nice looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great rollaway bed so far.
customer_reviews.text: This bed not only looks great- it sleeps great too! I tested it myself and no hard spots or lumps, firm feel. Your house guest may not want to leave. Easy to set up and fold away. Rolls well. Will see how it holds up over time but looks like its built well so right now I think it is a bargain. Wish they had a storage cover available for it, even if it cost extra.
customer_reviews.author: A. Wollmann

customer_reviews.title: OMG!!! Smell awful!
customer_reviews.text: This bed smell so bad I had to take it out of my room and take the cover off and wash a few times. I have sprayed air freshener, perfume, and other deodorizing sprays to get rid of the smell but no luck! I do not recommend this bed at all! Smell like mold!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: I purchased this in hopes that it would be a better choice than the floor
customer_reviews.text: I have a house guest that for some reason loves to sleep on the floor. I was not having that. I purchased this in hopes that it would be a better choice than the floor. I LOVE IT! very easy to set up. The hook to keep it closed is a bit short, so I struggle a little to lock it. However, I prefer that than a flimsy hook. The mattress is very firm. Overall, I'm happy I spent the money. I believe it will be used quite often.
customer_reviews.author: majestic

customer_reviews.title: Good if your guest is shorter than 5,9' and general size.
customer_reviews.text: I got it now, and Odor is not that bad and a paper says it will go away in a day. It is little different than I had expected earlier. It's soft, little low, little narrow (fine for normal size people), not very heavy without mattress, not dark as that video shows, and it you press you bottom down hardly you can feel frame little bit but ok for sleep on it.
customer_reviews.author: tenzin phuntsok

customer_reviews.title: size and comfort is great
customer_reviews.text: We have a very small cottage, very small. This fit beautifully. It just arrived and it took just a few minutes to complete putting the wheels on. It seems like an amazing purchase. How it includes shipping for that price is amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Dede

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect. Very Stable
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect. Very Stable. I don't have to worry about my cats under it. Folds up easily for storage and allows me to have a bad available for guests that is comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Joni

customer_reviews.title: says it's nice and firm
customer_reviews.text: My mom has slept on this for 2 weeks now, no issues. She has severe scoliosis, says it's nice and firm. It also looks nice!
customer_reviews.author: Mama*tsa

customer_reviews.title: Hard (firmer than firm) mattress, but great product, sturdy & easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: Really hard mattress. I thought I would like firm, but this is like sleeping on a board. However, I really like this product. It is sturdy and really well designed. Easy to use, easy to put away. Looks really expensive when open as a bed because of the bed skirt thing. I'm going to have to buy a squishy mattress topper for it, so even though this product is a really good value, when adding in the cost of the topper, it's not quite as good a value.
customer_reviews.author: Jaysa M.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Folding Bed
customer_reviews.text: This bed is very easy to move and set up. The memory foam was a bit hard for my taste so I added a gel topper. It would be better if the wheels locked as the bed it very light weight and moves easily when getting into it. Overall, satisfied with my purchase. Also, the strap to hold it closed could be a bit longer to make it easier to attach to other side.
customer_reviews.author: CarolB

customer_reviews.title: Bad Oder
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bed before I had knee surgery as I was not able to sleep up stairs for a while. The bed is great except for one big problem---it has a gross order. Like rotted leaves. I have put a plastic sheet, mattress pad, sheet and blanket & it still smells.. As I am in need of this bed for the next 3 month. I can not send back. But it is something you should work on. We were going to bring to camp after I use it.......I might just have to throw it out. Waste of money-lots of good possibilities if the smell went away.
customer_reviews.author: PP

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t be happier!
customer_reviews.text: Our Zinus Memory Foam Bed (narrow twin size) arrived sooner than promised. It is sturdy and the foam mattress is firm and comfortable. Other reviewers noted a strong smell, that was certainly not the case with ours. It did take two of us to carry into the house and up the stairs. The assembly was simple and involved screwing four wheels on, two of which are locking. This bed is easy to open and close and rolls into the closest for storage. It is a bit lower to the floor but that makes it perfect for visiting grandchildren.
customer_reviews.author: AndrC.

customer_reviews.title: excellent quality and comfort
customer_reviews.text: The mattress is firm but also surprisingly comfortable. The bed itself is quality and attractive looking. A great bed for the money. There is a slight chemical odor with the rubberized underside of the mattress and the top portion of the frame. We turned the mattress upside and took it off the frame so both could air out for a few days. It worked. The wheels are sturdy and well made.
customer_reviews.author: marce

customer_reviews.title: These are fantastic - really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: These are fantastic - really comfortable, and look very smart when unfolded. Would not hesitate to recommend these. Wish they came in 80inch length (so that they could be put together with a mattress topper to make a full size king).
customer_reviews.author: Rob C

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Amazing great bed extremely easy to assemble. Got this for my one pup who could no longer make the leap to my bed. She wouldn't use doggy stairs now she is extremely happy and so is my back. Just a perfect size and height for what I wanted and needed. Love it so does Krissy!!!
customer_reviews.author: kmf

customer_reviews.title: Great guest beds!  Easy to install.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. Very well built. These were awesome beds. I had my brother, his wife and their kid stay on these for 10 nights. I had to make both beds into king so the 3 of them would fit. Very comfortable I should say. We had to transport it to the 2nd floor which was not a problem at all as they were not too heavy. Just remember that this has a mattress (which is great by the way) so make sure you have a place to store it after use.
customer_reviews.author: An

customer_reviews.title: This is a Very Firm Bed
customer_reviews.text: Bed is great quality of construction and quite portable. If you are used to soft bed, don't buy it. The description is a bit misleading regarding the comfort level. We almost sent it back but instead purchased a 3" twin size egg crate memory foam topper. It barely fits (oversize) and could create a problem for storage. With the topper, the bed is quite comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not only does it roll into / out of any room easily, it unfolds and folds up easily as well
customer_reviews.text: This bed is THE BOMB!! I purchased it for a spare bedroom that also serves as my office/crafts room. So, really there is no room for a bed in there. No problem. This really does not take up a lot of space. Not only does it roll into / out of any room easily, it unfolds and folds up easily as well. I love the overall ease of use. I would highly, highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a spare guest bed.
customer_reviews.author: Ms. S. Jeannie

customer_reviews.title: Provides just enough comfort for a good night's rest
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this bed as I had house guests over this past summer. I added a memory foam topper to it (although I felt it was quite comfy before this). My girlfriend slept on it and could not believe it was a roll away bed. Definitely worth the purchase if you are having guests over that are not staying too long. Provides just enough comfort for a good night's rest.
customer_reviews.author: MONICA GARNER

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Worth the investment. I got it for my mom to sleep in every day for 3 months while she was visiting us and she was very comfortable in the mattress. It was worth spending more that I was expecting on a foldable mattress!
customer_reviews.author: lulu2012

customer_reviews.title: "more comfortable than our regular bed"
customer_reviews.text: This bed which we purchased for our guest room is actually more comfortable than our regular bed. The mattress has just the perfect firmness in my opinion. It was easy to setup and fit perfectly in our spare room. Sometimes, there seems to be a slight chemical smell, not too sure about that, but it honestly wouldn't stop me from purchasing another one of these if I had the room. I leave it open all the time, but it is good to know that I could fold it up if necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Just what Goldilocks would want!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, good size, good height, and it even looks nice. Folds easily. Not too heavy. Purchased when my 80-something mother in law was coming to visit, and it was just perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Robbins

customer_reviews.title: High quality bed
customer_reviews.text: We needed this guest bed for an aide who came to take care of my elderly mother. It’s really nice looking which is important as it had to be set up in a living room. Of course it can be folded up if necessary. It folds nicely. Seems to be comfortable - I think the aide is satisfied. It may be more pricey than others but my feeling is that you get what you pay for. This bed is definitely high quality.
customer_reviews.author: MST55

customer_reviews.title: It's a nice roll away bed
customer_reviews.text: I got this bed a while ago for any guests that we might have spend the night. It does the job, but I have an issue with MY order. My order only came with 3 wheels. This throws the bed off balance and it kind of closes when leaning on that wheel-less side. I have messaged the seller on Amazon and Zinus from their website and I haven't heard from them. Don't expect any customer service if you buy this product and if it's missing a piece, be prepared to return it as you're not going to be helped.
customer_reviews.author: Dave O

customer_reviews.title: The odor of the foam is overwhelming
customer_reviews.text: I've aired my mattress for over a week, in the sun, spraying a mix of water/bleach (thinking there was mold because of the smell). I finally had to take the cover off - wash that and then wrap the foam itself in saran wrap with clothers dryer sheets to kill the smell, just so my guest could sleep in it. Otherwise it stunk up the entire room.
customer_reviews.author: Toni L Lovejoy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, looks neat and clean.
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable, my adult children take naps on it while they wait till traffic dyes down before they drive back home. I have it in the living room by a window behind a couch grandchildren love to sit or lay on it. Does not take away from the look of my living room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Portable Bed....EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I freaking LOVE this bed! Super comfortable and great looking. I bought it when I had my hip replacement and thought I'd have to live on the ground floor for a time. Only slept on it one night, but I was great for relaxing, and napping. A little pricey but would absolutely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: V. Howard

customer_reviews.title: Great Bed !!!!!
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I can say is that this bed is FIRM and it is great quality and recovery foam....Didn't notice a smell from the covers...Great Product !!!
customer_reviews.author: trace-cat

customer_reviews.title: Top choice
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy. Easy to assemble. Added Target 1.5" memory foam topper......fantastic feel. The strap to hold bed closed is woefully short. Bought a braided men's belt that has holes woven in the pattern...works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wheels/casters are cheap and don't support bed well
customer_reviews.text: Initially loved this bed as a spare bed for when my mother--in-law would visit. She said it was comfortable. The casters have broken, however, so it cannot be wheeled anywhere and the wheels act as support for the middle when the bed is open so the bed sags in the middle when weight is placed upon it. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Elwood

customer_reviews.title: What is that smell?
customer_reviews.text: Although I think this is a great looking bed and it feels comfortable enough for somone to sleep on without bars poking you in the back, BUT the smell of the foam is overpowering. I have aired it out for several days and it still has the smell. If you can eliminate that feature I would say this is a good bed for guests
customer_reviews.author: Diane R. Dills

customer_reviews.title: Slimline, very comfy, easy to fold.
customer_reviews.text: I needed a bed for a few months in our spare room while I was getting ready to move out of the country and other family were moving into the house/into my old room. This bed is great! Comfy, easy to fold and move around. I sleep really well on it :) It is on the smaller side and quite narrow. I am 5'4" and fairly slim and fit fine. It probably wouldn't work so well for someone tall or with a large frame.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Nice but latch is too short.
customer_reviews.text: I have not tried it out but my guest said it was comfortable . It is firm so I added a little foam mattress pad on top and my guest said it was even better. They stayed a month so maybe it is too nice. I gave it a four star rating only because the latch to store the bed is too short and it is very difficult to latch the bed closed.
customer_reviews.author: Ray

customer_reviews.title: Great for smaller spaces
customer_reviews.text: My friend says this was the best choice for her small bedroom; very comfortable, and she said she can’t feel the hump, where it unfolds
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Good emergency guest bed
customer_reviews.text: Needed a guest bed quick- pros: it's comfortable, off the ground but not too low, easy to open and close, stores well cons: it is narrower than a regular twin size- be sure you are ok with that
customer_reviews.author: L.M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This bed was very comfortable for my mother. She said she slept better than in her own bed.
customer_reviews.author: Skittles

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and VERY well made
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best made roll away bed I have ever seen. It is very over-built and is pretty comfortable. Criticism in other reviews that the mattress is overly firm is spot on. We bought a 1" gel foam topper for it and that did the trick. The resulting bed is just as comfortable as any other bed in the house.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Overall good purchase
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great solution for a tiny space. Very comfortable. Three stars only because I wanted to use bed lifts. Every time I try to place them under the legs the whole bed folds up. So you’re not going to be able to get it any higher off the floor. I made a tiny headboard with cardboard and fabric. Looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Karen J

customer_reviews.title: High quality but smells
customer_reviews.text: It has a chemical smell. I think it might be just me sensitive to smell. The bed itself is very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Top mattress did Not fit the foldable bed frame.
customer_reviews.text: The top mattress was to short and did not fit the frame of the foldable bed very disappointed. But it is comfy to sleep in is what my guess have told me
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne Torres

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable but such a pain in the behind
customer_reviews.text: Love the material and the comfort of the bed. Hate what a pain in the behind it is to fold it back up. Takes two people to be able to squeeze it "together" enough to get the bungee cord hook on the right place.
customer_reviews.author: C Zick

customer_reviews.title: I love the small size
customer_reviews.text: I love the small size, will fit in my camper very well..Quality is great..Looks more expensive than what it was...Very comfortable also...
customer_reviews.author: Arlene Pemberton

customer_reviews.title: Nice extra bed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter's dorm room- it fits under her bed. It is fairly bulky when folded up, but it is on wheels for easy moving and storage if you have a big closet. It is comfy and nice looking gray.
customer_reviews.author: Sulli

customer_reviews.title: cofortable
customer_reviews.text: love it. a little hard to undo the latch on top, but works good other than that!!
customer_reviews.author: linda gana

customer_reviews.title: Well made and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this cot. My teenage son is always having his friends hang out in the basement and end up staying the night. Bought a couple of these for them and they are comfortable enough and strong enough for 6’ 225lbs teenager.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Roll Away Bed for Small Spaces
customer_reviews.text: I puchase this roll away bed to sleep on, it sleeps great. It also is the perfect Livingroom Coach. Perfect for small spaces
customer_reviews.author: Jack Russell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, comfortable bed.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent, good quality and comfy. Wheels could use a brake. Mattress is extremely comfortable, needed one to accommodate Granma to meet her new grandson. Needed something comfortable for more than one night. No complains. Looks hq and easy to put together. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Luis H Declet

customer_reviews.title: You have to like a firm sleep as I do
customer_reviews.text: You have to like a firm sleep as I do, though I do have a thick quilt under me to cushion this a bit. Otherwise, this has been a great bed, easy to fold up and down, very sturdy! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn S.

product_meta.title: Zinus Memory Foam Resort Folding Guest Bed with Wheels, Standard Twin
product_meta.description: Size:TwinThe Sleep Master Memory Foam Resort Folding Guest Bed by Zinus is our most luxurious guest bed. Designed for ultimate comfort, style and durability. The 5 inch mattress with 1 inch of memory foam and 4 inches of High-density Base Support Foam will give your guests a comfortable night’s sleep while away from home. Strap and hook included to keep the guest bed securely closed during storage. The latest evolution of memory foam, Biofoam replaces some of the traditional petroleum with natural plant oil, and includes natural green tea extract and all natural active charcoal to help absorb moisture, eliminate odors, and keep your mattress fresh. Worry free 1 year limited warranty. Another comfort innovation from Zinus. Pioneering comfort.
feature_bullets: Features a 5 inch mattress with 1 inch of memory foam and 4 inches of High-density Base Support Foam
Matching fabric on mattress and frame designed to look like a box spring and mattress set
The dimensions of the item folded is 38.6" x 15.4" x 48.6". Opens to a twin-size 38 inches x 75 inches x 19 inches (mattress + frame)
Only the Highest Quality Foam – Foam is CertiPUR-US Certified for durability, performance, and content

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars685 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
